text:
Nowadays a lot of ajax frameworks use POST requests with content-type other than the default application/x-www-form-urlencoded, e.g. GWT needs text/plain, some of mootools requests need application/xml.

It would be best to add the possibility to configure all the HTTP header parameters in HTTP Sampler.
creator: Krzysztof.Krason@sabre.com

text: The header manager can be used to send any headers that are required.
